<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mending Lattice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=224)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 568 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 525 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield or weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

**Trigger** The affixed item would take damage

**Requirement** You are a master in Crafting
</row>

</column>

---

This lattice of reinforced iron is shaped into a perfect octagon. When you activate it, it negates the damage and instantly and completely repairs the affixed item.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
